definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Caching works best for read-only data.
sentences.chinese: 緩存非常適合於只讀數據。

sentences.english: Investigation on control technique of adjustabl. e double loop optical buffer in large range.
sentences.chinese: 大範圍可調的雙環全光緩存器的控制技術的研究。

sentences.english: But OpenDNS caches the entire Web.
A non-shared cache is accessible by a single user only.
sentences.chinese: 非共享緩存只由單個用戶訪問。

sentences.english: The field cache has therefore been modified such that it only reloads parts where the segment has changed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，修改後的字段緩存只會加載更新過的片斷。

sentences.english: You use this function to pull data into the cache shortly before it's needed. As shown below, the __builtin_prefetch function takes three arguments
sentences.chinese: 在需要數據之前，使用這個函數把數據放到緩存中。

sentences.english: For example, when location services are off, the device still collects information in the cache.
sentences.chinese: 譬如，當位置服務關閉時，設備緩存繼續收集信息。

sentences.english: This sets the maximum potential size of a tuple which we will store in the cache.
sentences.chinese: 這設置了將要存儲在緩存中的元組的最大可能大小。

sentences.english: The cache can countervail server load.
sentences.chinese: 緩存可以抵消服務器負載。

sentences.english: Some cache objects are set to automatically update by default.
sentences.chinese: 在默認情況下，某些緩存對象設置爲自動更新。

sentences.english: The cache occupies the same addressable memory space as the applications.
sentences.chinese: 緩存與應用程序佔用相同的可尋址內存空間。

sentences.english: Describes four ways to install an assembly into the global assembly cache.
sentences.chinese: 描述四種將程序集安裝到全局程序集緩存的方法。

sentences.english: Again, it provides optimization such as hints and data caching.
sentences.chinese: 而且，它提供提示和數據緩存等優化方法。

sentences.english: What do we mean when we say clustering and how does it differ from caching?
sentences.chinese: 當我們說集羣時意味着什麼，它和緩存有什麼區別？

sentences.english: For example, with this affinity there would be a higher cache-hit rate.
sentences.chinese: 例如，使用此關聯會產生較高的緩存命中率。

sentences.english: Is Amazon EC Redis an effective caching solution or not?
sentences.chinese: 亞馬遜電子商務是一個有效的緩存解決方案或不？

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
to start the servers (for an online game, typically after the system has been shut down for maintenance, upgrade etc)
